Name: Malatzshia
About the game: You find out that everything around you is your own dream. In order to wake up you will have to find a code within the deep universe of your mind. However, you will discover that your mind is not only yours anymore. An insidious nightmare has infiltrated your inner life and is determined to wipe out your identity. Once you get the full code and defeat the final nightmare you will wake up. There are a couple of crucial items during the game. Here are some of them: THE RING OF SHAPE This artefact allows you to transform into different creatures with various skills and abilities. THE RING OF INVISIBILITY This ring allows you to become invisible and get through important passages. NECKLACE OF HOPE A crucial item that is necessary to beat the game. Only with this item you will be able to overcome despair. SPHERE OF IDENTITY This sphere allows you to transform into the knight. SPHERE OF RETURN This useful orb helps you get back to the house in Issilia.
